verses.roman:
tadā vikuṇṭha-dhiṣaṇāt
tayor nipatamānayoḥ
hāhā-kāro mahān āsīd
vimānāgryeṣu putrakāḥ

synonyms: tadā—then; vikuṇṭha—of the Supreme Lord; dhiṣaṇāt—from the abode; tayoḥ—as both of them; nipatamānayoḥ—were falling; hāhā-kāraḥ—roaring in disappointment; mahān—great; āsīt—occurred; vimāna-agryeṣu—in the best of airplanes; putrakāḥ—O demigods.
translation: Then, as Jaya and Vijaya fell from the Lord's abode, a great roar of disappointment arose from all the demigods, who were sitting in their splendid airplanes.
